title: Trump Crypto Dinner Offers Presidential Access for Top $TRUMP Coin Buyers
summary: Top 25 investors in $TRUMP memecoin attended private reception with President Trump, receiving $100,000 crypto-themed Trump watches. Justin Sun, the biggest $TRUMP coin holder, attended the dinner. The event sparked an ethics investigation by Senator Blumenthal, who alleged this represented an unprecedented 'pay-to-play' scheme allowing foreign actors to financially influence the presidency.
description: The crypto dinner represented unprecedented pay-to-play scheme where cryptocurrency purchases directly bought presidential access. Fight Fight Fight LLC promoted the dinner and White House VIP tour for top token holders. Senator Blumenthal opened investigation calling it "unprecedented pay-to-play scheme to provide access to the Presidency to the highest bidder" that allows foreign governments and individuals to directly enrich the President while hiding payoffs in blockchain pseudonymity.
